trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for requesting the security status of an action from the <xref href="System.AppDomainManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse for ber om sikkerhetsstatusen for en handling fra den <xref href="System.AppDomainManager"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: You must inherit from this class to provide a class that includes a property that specifies the security-sensitive action to be performed.
trans-unit.target: Du må arve fra denne klassen for å angi en klasse som inneholder en egenskap som angir sikkerhetsfølsom handlingen som utføres.

trans-unit.source: The SecurityState object that is instantiated from the derived class is passed to the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the host allows that action to be performed.
trans-unit.target: SecurityState-objektet som startes fra den utledede klassen som er sendt til den <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å finne ut om verten tillater at handlingen utføres.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A> method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av den <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A>metoden returnerer alltid `false`.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method must be overridden to detect the actions that are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden må overstyres for å finne ut handlingene som er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to access a Web camera in your library code, you would create a `WebcamSecurityState` object and call the <xref:System.Security.SecurityState.EnsureState%2A> method to determine whether the host allows Web camera access, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til en Web-kamera i biblioteket koden, vil du opprette en `WebcamSecurityState` objekt og kall av <xref:System.Security.SecurityState.EnsureState%2A>metode for å finne ut om verten posttilgang Web kameraet, som vist i eksemplet.</xref:System.Security.SecurityState.EnsureState%2A>

trans-unit.source: (You can find the code for `WebcamSecurityState` in the "Example" section.) ``` WebcamSecurityState securityState = new WebcamSecurityState("Safe access to Webcam", WebcamSecurityOptions.SafeAccess); try { securityState.EnsureState(); // Allocate memory. } catch (ApplicationException e) { // Handle any exception that is thrown. System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(e.Message); } ``` To process the call the <xref:System.AppDomainManager> must be made aware of `WebcamSecurityState` through an override of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: (Du kan finne koden for `WebcamSecurityState` i delen "Eksempel".) ``` WebcamSecurityState securityState = new WebcamSecurityState("Safe access to Webcam", WebcamSecurityOptions.SafeAccess); try { securityState.EnsureState(); // Allocate memory. } catch (ApplicationException e) { // Handle any exception that is thrown. System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(e.Message); } ```Behandle kallet i <xref:System.AppDomainManager>må være oppmerksom på `WebcamSecurityState` via en overstyring av den <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, som vist i eksemplet.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, ensures that the state that is represented by <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> is available on the host.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, sikrer at tilstanden som representeres av <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> er tilgjengelig på verten.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this method should be similar to the following example.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av denne metoden må være lik eksemplet nedenfor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the state for this implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> class is available on the current host.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilstanden for denne implementeringen av den <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> klassen er tilgjengelig på den gjeldende verten.

trans-unit.source: IsStateAvailable calls the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the state that is represented by this class is available on the host.
trans-unit.target: IsStateAvailable kall av <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å finne ut om tilstanden som representeres av denne klassen er tilgjengelig på verten.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Security.SecurityState> class for an example implementation of the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Security.SecurityState>klasse for eksempelimplementering av den <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A>metoden.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A> </xref:System.Security.SecurityState>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis statusen er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
